channel.title: Need some help with a shop
channel.description:
I want my server to have a real economcy (sp?) and i want there to be a store that stocks 20 of each rare at a set price, and once the rares are sold out they are gone forever.
When i restart my server the shop stocks back up on the rares :(
Can anyone hepl me?
Thx

item.title: Need some help with a shop
item.dc:creator: @gigabyt3r gigabyt3r
item.description:
@gigabyt3r wrote:

Ok thx for the reply, anyone else know?

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with a shop

item.title: Need some help with a shop
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

Economy.

And if you had, for example, NPC’s who sold them through a dialogue it would work (along with being much easier). I’m sure it could work the way you want it to by writing to the shops.cfg file but I wouldn’t know how to do that so I can’t help you with that.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with a shop
